item.title: Naughty Dog Put In An Absurd Amount Of Effort Just For The Sandbag Effect In Uncharted 4
item.description:
Naughty Dog Put In An Absurd Amount Of Effort Just For The Sandbag Effect In Uncharted 4

Naughty Dog are crazy. That is the only explanation for the amount of work they put in for the most ridiculous kinds of minutiae in their games.

item.title: Ecstasy of Order: The Tetris Masters
item.description:
Ecstasy of Order: The Tetris Masters

A documentary that captures the greatest world record Tetris players as they prepare for the Classic Tetris World Championship. From the days of Thor Aackerlund and his historic victory at the 1990 Nintendo World Championships, right up to the present and Harry Hong's perfect "Max-Out" score, this documentary expertly chronicles over two decades of Tetris Mastery.

item.title: Final Fantasy Masterminds Reminisce About Their Favorite Moments
item.description:
Final Fantasy Masterminds Reminisce About Their Favorite Moments

The Final Fantasy series has been running for nearly 30 years, spanning 14 mainline entries and a slew of spinoffs. Come September 30, it will celebrate its long-awaited 15th entry, which we've been looking at all month alongside our May cover story.

item.title: Footage Of Cancelled Game 1666: Amsterdam Surfaces Online - Do You Even Game Bro?
item.description:
Footage Of Cancelled Game 1666: Amsterdam Surfaces Online - Do You Even Game Bro?

Footage has surfaced online of 1666: Amsterdam, the cancelled game from Assassin's Creed creator Patrice Désilets. You can watch it below (the quality is poor): Development of the game began when Désilets left Ubisoft to join THQ in their newly developed Montreal based studio - who were then later acquired by Ubisoft when THQ filed for bankruptcy.

item.title: SEGA's New Emulator is a Love Letter to Fans
item.description:
SEGA's New Emulator is a Love Letter to Fans

SEGA has launched an updated version to its SEGA Genesis & Mega Drive Classics and let me tell you, it looks gorgeous. I've heard rumblings of a free update but the features here blew me past my expectations. You can find details on what I'm talking about in the short video.

item.title: The Walking Dead Season 3 Needs Clementine as the Main Character - Gamer Professionals
item.description:
The Walking Dead Season 3 Needs Clementine as the Main Character - Gamer Professionals

Telltale's The Walking Dead Season 3 needs Clementine as the main character. The Walking Dead is arguably Telltale's largest property, with Season One receiving a number of accolades and Game of the Year awards. Robert Kirkland recently revealed that Clementine will appear in Season 3 of Telltale's The Walking Dead, but in what capacity?

item.title: Jim Sterling Has Figured Out an Ingenious Way of Avoiding YouTube's Copyright Claims - CraveOnline
item.description:
Jim Sterling Has Figured Out an Ingenious Way of Avoiding YouTube's Copyright Claims - CraveOnline

Jim Sterling, popular YouTube critic and host of web series The Jimquisition, has figured out a frankly ingenious way of avoiding copyright claims and content ID matches on the video-sharing site. In his latest episode of The Jimquisition, Sterling discusses Nintendo and the middling response to the company's recent release of Star Fox Zero.

item.title: PewDiePie asks fans to confront his "immature" past
item.description:
PewDiePie asks fans to confront his "immature" past

PewDiePie has asked the more nostalgic members of his community to confront the mistakes of his past, from the technical issues to his insensitive use of language. In a video called "Old vs. New PewDiePie," the ubiquitous streaming celebrity noted the growing amount of feedback from people who perceived a slip in standards.

item.title: Uncharted 4's marketing campaign is 'PlayStation's largest ever' for a game - Uncharted 4: A Thief's End for PS4 News
item.description:
Uncharted 4's marketing campaign is 'PlayStation's largest ever' for a game - Uncharted 4: A Thief's End for PS4 News

Uncharted 4 is receiving "PlayStation's largest ever" software marketing campaign, Sony UK has said, with hordes of digital, print and TV adverts planned, alongside "innovative" in-store marketing that will see Drake "swinging from a real rope".

item.title: Deus Ex: Mankind Divided new trailer - PS4, Xbox One collectors edition and DLC details
item.description:
Deus Ex: Mankind Divided new trailer - PS4, Xbox One collectors edition and DLC details

SQUARE ENIX has released a brand new explosive trailer for the once delayed Deus Ex: Mankind Divided and it now looks as though it's been worth the wait.
